Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2007 02:47PM Zina wrote: Thank you to everyone who gave advise.  I have talked to my OBGYN.  She wasn't real happy with the news about my 3rd sister getting BC.  She told me she would help me with the counselor and more test.  It is nice to know that I'm not alone.  I do feel like I have a dark cloud looming above me.  I tell myself to think positive, but we all know how easy that is to do.  Thanks again, Love Zina
Posts.Title: 3 sisters all have BC, am I next? Zina Paulette531

Posts.Content: Zina wrote: Hi, I have 3 sisters who all have had BC before menopause.  I am 42 what are my chances? Log in to post a reply
